text: Keita Asama (born August 19, 1984 in Chiba, Chiba, Japan) is a former Japanese baseball player.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=asama-001kei He played in the Pacific League for the Chiba Lotte Marines. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:People from Chiba (city) Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Chiba Lotte Marines players
title: Keita Asama
